adHeader: Why rent when you can OWN?!
adDetails: Interest rates are historically low and home prices are extremely affordable in the Bay Area. If you are paying more than $1000 in rent, you may be able to buy a home and lower your monthly housing expenses. Call me today for more information. Bonnie Manolas Realtor BRE#01857217 show contact info Windermere Real Estate Lynne French and Associates http://getrealwithbonnie.withwre.com/ (Free Property Search) Bio: I am a Bay Area native; born and raised in San Francisco. I have lived and worked in various East Bay cities from Pittsburg to Fremont. Prior to selling Real Estate, I spent most of my career in the customer service industries of retail sales, telecommunications, technology, education, and appraisal. Simply put, helping others is what I do. My experiences have taught me the patience, compassion, and integrity that I have brought into my Real Estate business. My goal is to help families achieve their dream of owning a home. I will listen closely to your needs and desires and match you to the home that is right for you. Buying a home is one of the most important purchases you will ever make and I want to make your experience pleasant and professional. If you're looking for an agent with your best interest at heart, then give me a call. Your future home is waiting for you.
